data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus Stenolis Bates (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae, Lamiinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Monné, Miguel A. (2011): Revision of the genus Stenolis Bates (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae, Lamiinae). Zootaxa 2831: 39-53, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.204533
